prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is divided into several packages, including core functionality, utility functions, execution tools for various APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, DeepSeek), and integrations for document processing and web crawling.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
